# Build output directories
bin/
obj/
out/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Auto-generated files
*.Generated.cs

# Logs
*.log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak
~$*

# Visual Studio and IDE-specific
.vscode/
.idea/
.vs/
*.csproj.user

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
project.lock.json

# Dependency directories
node_modules/

# Razor page compilation files
*.razor.g.cs
*.razor.g.i.cs

# Coverage files
coverage/

# Publish output
wwwroot/dist/
wwwroot/.pubxml/
wwwroot/.publish/

# Sensitive configuration files (ensure safety)
appsettings.json
appsettings.*.json
